ew-extension.name: PHPWord
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Use PHPWord to export HTML to Word Developer Website: http://phpword.codeplex.com/ PHPWord is available under the terms of the LGPL License.
Notes: 1. Supports exporting to 'Word2007' format only. To open PHPWord created files in Microsoft Office < 2007, Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3) is required. 2. Supports exporting images and charts (as images), but does NOT support styling cells. 3. The advanced settings "ColumnWidth" and "RowHeight" are in twips. If specified, they'll be used for ALL cells.
Requirements: (See http://phpword.codeplex.com/documentation for detail) - PHP version 5.2.0 or higher - PHP extension php_zip enabled - PHP extension php_xml enabled
Note: This extension is NOT part of PHPMaker, NO technical support will be provided.
